description: Star and fans reached out on social media to send their thoughts and prayers to Tracy Morgan, after he was critically injured in a bus crash.
title: Tracy Morgan's Former Co-Stars and Fellow Comics Send Well-Wishes After Crash
title_page: Tracy Morgan's Former Co-Stars and Fellow Comics Send Well-Wishes After Crash
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
Fans, former castmates and fellow funny people sent their thoughts and prayers to actor and comedian Tracy Morgan after he was critically injured in a highway bus accident Friday night.
The "30 Rock" star and "Saturday Night Live" alum remained in the intensive care unit at Robert Wood Johnson Hospital in New Brunswick, New Jersey, on Saturday, following the six-car crash that killed one passenger on Morgan's limo bus.
Member's of the NBC family also sent get-well-soon messages to Morgan:
The actors who played "Dot Com" and "Grizz," members of "Tracy Jordan's" entourage on "30 Rock," also reached out:
